ketoneModules.name: Dietary Ketosis
ketoneModules.instructions: Learn how different dietary approaches affect ketone production.

data.name: Keto Meal
data.description: High-fat, low-carb meals can increase ketone production over several hours.

data.name: Intermittent Fasting
data.description: Extended fasting periods naturally increase ketone production.

data.name: MCT Oil
data.description: Medium-chain triglycerides can rapidly increase ketone levels.

ketoneModules.name: Exercise & Ketones
ketoneModules.instructions: Discover how different types of exercise affect ketone levels.

data.name: Aerobic Exercise
data.description: Steady aerobic exercise can modestly increase ketone production.

data.name: HIIT Workout
data.description: High-intensity training may temporarily increase ketones.

data.name: Strength Training
data.description: Weight training has minimal impact on ketone production.

data.name: Yoga/Meditation
data.description: Gentle movement and stress reduction may support ketosis.

ketoneModules.name: Metabolic States
ketoneModules.instructions: Understand how different metabolic conditions affect ketones.

data.name: Nutritional Ketosis
data.description: Sustained ketogenic diet maintains steady ketone levels.

data.name: Morning Rise
data.description: Natural morning hormone changes can affect ketone levels.

data.name: Stress Response
data.description: Acute stress can temporarily alter ketone production.

data.name: Sleep Deprivation
data.description: Poor sleep can disrupt metabolic processes including ketosis.
